name: C.R.A.B.S.
description:
You are part of the C.R.A.B.S. division of the CIA, you must destroy the underground moth scheme 'Operation Lamp'. Blast your way through the base to eliminate the threat. Mobilise the entire crew of the C.R.A.B.S. agency, trust no one agent to get the job done.

Have fun!

Controls:  ArrowKeys /  WASD to move, SPACE to jump, CNTRl to fall faster, MOUSE to look around, LEFT CLICK to shoot, F to unlock mouse from screen.
